components

Class ReservationStation

  • java.lang.Object
    • components.ReservationStation

  • public class ReservationStation
extends java.lang.Object
    Reservation station class
    Also used to represent Load/Store buffers
    Author:
    David

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReservationStation

        public ReservationStation(int size,
                          int type)
        Constructor for a reservation station
        Parameters:
        size - number of lines/spots in the station
        type - the type of station we want (what unit is this a station for?)

    • Method Detail

      • addInstruction

        public void addInstruction(Instruction inst,
                           int thread)
        Add new instruction to station.
        Should only be called if there is room in the station
        Empty spot has an EMPTY instruction
        Parameters:
        inst - the new instruction object to be injected into the station
        thread - the thread to whom the instruction belongs

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull()
        Tells us if there is room in this station for more commands
        Uses emptySpotIndex method, compared its result to -1
        Returns:
        true if full, false otherwise

      • emptySpotIndex

        public int emptySpotIndex()
        Iterate over all lines in station, if one is empty return its location
        Returns:
        location of empty line or -1 if station is full

      • isReadyIndex

        public int isReadyIndex()
        gets the index of a command that is in the station and ready to be executed
        If there are several, choose the one with the smallest issue CC!!!
        Why? because for some reason I thought it was smart at the time. meh..
        Returns:
        index of instruction that is ready to be executed, -1 if no such instruction exists

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        checks if this station has any commands in it
        Returns:
        true if the station is empty , false otherwise

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Converts a reservation station to a string Used for debugging
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • getInstructions

        public Instruction[] getInstructions()

      • setInstructions

        public void setInstructions(Instruction[] instructions)

      • getInExecution

        public boolean[] getInExecution()

      • setInExecution

        public void setInExecution(boolean[] inExecution)
